name: Categorized Simple FAQ Plugin
author: wamasoftware

sections.description:
Simple FAQ allows you to add FAQ category wise.And view all FAQ category wise into one page.you can add more then one category shortcode into one page.You can display limit into FAQ.

You can add category of FAQ.You can add same FAQ into multiple category.It allows category wise shortcode and also generalized shorcode.

Features
* Unlimited FAQ, unlimited FAQ tag and unlimited FAQ category support
* Accordion styles to hide/show FAQ.
* Create FAQ categories
* Create FAQ posts and you can assign categories to them
* Responsive FAQ design
* You can assign multiple category to one FAQ
* Accordion styles to hide/show FAQ.
* Easy shortcode to use.
* Easy to configure FAQ in admin section.
* General shortcode for all faq.
* Add one faq into mutiple category.

FAQ Shortcodes

  • [simplefaq] : For display all FAQs.
  • [simplefaq category=’14’] : For display FAQs category wise
  • [simplefaq category=’14’ limit=’3′] : For display FAQs category wise with display limit.
sections.installation:
Using FTP

  1. Upload the entire Simple FAQ folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress admin.
  3. Create Add new FAQ using create new and add FAQS using this and create category or select category.
  4. Use shortcode from category menu and select shortcode from category table.

Uploading in WordPress Dashboard

  1. Download Simple FAQ.zip.
  2. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard.
  3. Navigate to the ‘Upload’ area.
  4. Select Simple FAQ.zip from your computer.
  5. Click ‘Install Now’.
  6. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard.
sections.changelog:
Version 2.0 -Jan-2024

  • Front: Solved FAQ display issue
  • Add Link from plugin page to FAQ Category page
  • Backend: Add Question in place of Add Title
  • Backend: Remove Featured Image section
  • Category: Click to copy shortcode
  • Seting: Front Design Options
  • Seting: Front Color, font, size, arrow style Customization Options
  • Seting: Click to copy shortcode
  • Front: Title Description Display customization

Version 0.1 -march-2017

  • New: Add FAQ
  • New: shortcode on each category
